en.ban_msg:
⛔️ **You are blocked** ⛔️
**This chat is not currently available for you**
en.admin_welcome:
Welcome {name}
you are an admin on this bot, use `/commands` to see all the commands list
en.forwarded: **You can not forward messages to this bot!**
en.user_not_found:
I couldn't find a user to reply to,
Please reply the user message or the message that says "reply to this message"
en.admin_ans:
The admin {admin} {action} to {link} with the message:
`{msg}`
en.blocked: I could not send the message, apparently the user blocked the robot
en.user_unblock: The user {link} ({uid}) released, The user is no longer blocked
en.unban_msg:
**Congratulations you have been released from the block**
You can now use the bot again
en.format_err: The message format is incorrect, please try again
en.success_welcome:
**Success**
Welcome message has been set up correctly.
en.bot_promote:
I must be an admin in this group with the following permissions:
	▪️Delete Messages
	▪️Ban Users
en.group_added:
🔗The group `{title}` was successfully added.
Now only This group members will be able to send messages through the bot
en.group_removed:
The Group {title} was successfully removed.
Now anyone will be able to send messages through the bot
en.settings:
**Bot settings:**
Here you can change the your language, remove the Welcome message (to re set the welcome message use: `/set welcome` command), see the admin list and the blocked users.
en.chang_lang:
Here you can change the bot language.
**Select your language:**
en.explain_welcome:
To disable the welcome message press on ✅.

**Disabled:**	☑️
**Enabled:**	✅
en.welcome_removed:
**The welcome message has removed.**
To re set the welcome message use: `/set welcome` command, for more help use `/help`
en.users_help:
With this bot you can contact the admin/s of this bot.
You can also change the bot language.

The bot is an open source project, if you want to add additional languages to the bot or offer it improvements or create one for yourself as well, you can [contact the creator of the bot](https://t.me/ido1234) or alternatively send suggestions on the [bot's page in GitHub](https://github.com/idokar/TGanonymusChatBot)

he.ban_msg:
⛔️ **נחסמת** ⛔️
**כעת אין ביכולתך לשלוח הודעות דרך צ'אט זה**
he.admin_welcome:
ברוך הבא {name}
אתה מנהל כעת ברובוט הזה, שלח `/פקודות` בכדי לראות את רשימת כל הפקודות
he.user_not_found:
לא מצאתי לאיזה משתמש להגיב,
אנא השב להודעת המשתמש או להודעה שאומרת "השב להודעה זו"
he.blocked: I could not send the message, apparently the user blocked the robot
he.user_unblock: The user {link} ({uid}) released, The user is no longer blocked
he.unban_msg:
**Congratulations you have been released from the block**
You can now use the bot again
he.format_err: The message format is incorrect, please try again
he.success_welcome:
**Success**
Welcome message has been set up correctly.
he.bot_promote:
I must be an admin in this group with the following permissions:
	▪️Delete Messages
	▪️Ban Users
he.group_added:
🔗הקבוצה `{title}` נוספה בהצלחה.
כעת רק חברי קבוצה זו יוכלו לשלוח הודעות דרך הבוט
he.group_removed:
The Group {title} was successfully removed.
Now anyone will be able to send messages through the bot
he.users_help:
בעזרת הבוט הזה תוכלו ליצור קשר עם המנהל/ים של הבוט.
ניתן גם לשנות את שפת הבוט לשפות נתמכות אחרות.

הבוט הזה הוא פרויקט קוד פתוח, אם ברצונך להוסיף שפות נוספות לרובוט או להציע לו שיפורים או ליצור לעצמך רובוט שכזה, תוכל/י [ליצור קשר עם יוצר הבוט](https://t.me/ido1234) או לחלופין לשלוח הצעות ב[דף הבוט ב- GitHub](https://github.com/idokar/TGanonymusChatBot)
